content: I am a Software Engineer at Redpanda Data. My work revolves around the reproducible evaluation of distributed storage, data management and real-time analytics systems. My 2019 PhD dissertation focused on applying the DevOps methodology on R&D and academic settings.

title: Ivo Jimenez
